version_description: Fixed firmware updater for EVI stuck in Recovery Mode

- Added Mazda SkyG RaceROM support
- Added live data without data-logging to file
- Added Help button in Settings page
- Added option to save DTCs to Archive
- Added other ECUs to Nissan VR30TT
- Changed log file extension to CSV
- Updated ECU definitions
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- Added support for more OBD PIDs for generic vehicles
- Updated ECU definitions
- Bug fixes

- Added Subaru 99/2002 basic support
- Added max log file size setting
- Improved timestamps in Ford data logging
- Fixed log file timestamps starting from non-zero
- Fixed possible crash when resuming the app
- Fixed crash on iPad when trying to Reset the log param selection
- Minor fixes
- Updated ECU definitions

- Changed default Log file size limit
- Improved layout of Boost Controller tool
- Updated ECU definitions

- Added customisable Dashboard
- Added preferred units settings (i.e. km/h - mph, °C - °F)
- Added automatic ECU definitions updates
- Improved existing features
- Fixed possible crash in Custom Inputs > Listbox when using long lists
- Fixed DTC Tool on Subaru Diesel
- Fixed landscape layout for iPhone 6/7/8

- added iPhone X support
- added vehicle menu icons
- added Subaru BRZ and Ford demo
- updated demo simulation data
- fixed error in Settings > Vehicle Interface when EVI has an invalid firmware
- fixed Mazda DISI Gen2 support
- Added support for Nissan GTR with aftermarket ECM

- Added Dashboard chart widget
- Added Dashboard vertical bar widget
- Added Dashboard per-page backgrounds
- Added Dashboard custom colours with alpha channel
- Added Dashboard per-widget colours
- Added support for Nissan Sentra
- Added 100-200 and 200-300 km/h measurements to Performance Analyzer
- Fixed issue trying to log an ECU for which no params can be read
- Fixed possible crash when trying to save Performance Card to Photo Library on iOS 11
- Fixed Subaru 2004 K-Line not getting recognised

- added Nissan 370Z demo mode
- fixed colour picker layout on iOS 10
- fixed some Subaru 2004 not getting recognised
- fixed clearing DTCs on EVO X TCM and ABS
- fixed Performance Analyser error when Vmax is selected
- fixed some rare crashes

- Fixed "Choose ECUs" and "Reset selection" buttons not visible
- Fixed HUD overlays

- added Traction Control tool
- improved Ford recognition logic
- improved EVI firmware updater

- improved Ford datalogging
- fixed Ford Demo mode
- fixed minor issues

- added OBD readiness tool
- fixed Ford demo mode
- fixed Nissan GTR TCM info page always indicating no RaceROM installed

- added Isuzu support
- added Dashboard digital widgets
- added ROM hash support

- fixed font in Performance Cards
- fixed possible crash in OBD readiness tool
- added workaround for Subaru DIT data-logging issue
- added BMW MEVD17 support
Bug fixes

- Faster vehicle recognition
- EVI can now be renamed
- Added VIN to Vehicle Info page

- Fixed detection of Nissan GTR with Motec ECM
- Fixed possible crash
- bug fixes
- added support for BMW S55
- fixed crash for existing BMW dashboard files

- added third-party email clients support
- fixed Syvecs ECM detection

- added option in settings to save GPS coordinates in log files
- added 60-130mph measurement to Performance Analyser
- Subaru DIT: added support for 2.5MB ECM
- Nissan GTR: added Malfunction Indicators tool
- Subaru BRZ: added Traction Control tool
- Nissan VR30TT: added support for logging stock ROMs without RaceROM
- bug fixes

- Fixed missing 60-130 mph option in Performance Analyser
- Fixed Max log file size setting
- Improved data-logging error messages
- minor changes
- BMW recognition fix
- Fixed Mazda DISI Gen2 datalogging error

- Bug fixes
- Improved iOS 13 support

- Added Nissan GTR 2019 support
- Added Toyota Supra 2019 support
- Added new Mazda MX5 modules
- Fixed Toyota Supra datalogging/dashboards only starting if vehicle stationary

- Fixed BMW S55 available logging parameters
- Fixed DTCs reading on some cars
- Fixed Nissan GTR ESUS DTCs reading

- BMW: fixed DTC clearing on some ECUs
- Nissan: fixed DTC clearing on some ECUs
- Nissan VR30TT: changed DTCs clearing strategy to support newer models
Bug fixes
- Toyota Supra: fixed some Datalog/Dashboard params not remembered correctly

- Added support for faster BMW datalogging with RaceROM
- Added support for SIMOS18.10 (ie. Volkswagen Golf Mk7.5)
- Minor fixes and improvements

- Added simplified file transfer with EcuTek Cloud
- Added ECU programming support for Nissan GTR/370Z/VR30TT and Subaru BRZ
- Minor improvements and fixes

- Nissan VR30TT: fixed possible error on some vehicle models
- Minor fixes

- Added programming support for Mazda MX-5 NC, Mazda-MX5 ND and Honda Civic 8th gen
- Minor bug fixes

- Added programming support for Subaru CAN and Subaru DIT
- Added support for RaceROM Subaru CAN/K-Line r47053
- Fixed Generic OBD support

- Added Vehicle Recognition Diagnostic tool
- Bug fixes

- Honda: fixed programming issue with RaceROM Flash files
- Volkswagen: added programming support
- BMW: added new DTCs descriptions
